jailbreakpipe.role.defenses.back_translate module

class jailbreakpipe.role.defenses.back_translate.BackTranslationDefender(config: BackTranslationDefenderConfig)[source]

Bases: BaseDefender

Defending LLMs against Jailbreaking Attacks via Backtranslation.

Reference: Wang, Yihan and Shi, Zhouxing and Bai, Andrew and Hsieh, Cho-Jui https://github.com/YihanWang617/LLM-Jailbreaking-Defense-Backtranslation

Parameters:

config – Configuration for the BackTranslation Defender. 用于BackTranslation Defender的配置

defense(messages: List[Dict[str, str]] | None = None) → List[Dict[str, str]][source]

Execute the defense mechanism by utilizing backtranslation techniques.

Parameters:

messages – List of input messages. 输入的消息列表

Returns:

Modified list of messages after applying the defense strategy. 应用防御策略后的更改消息列表

class jailbreakpipe.role.defenses.back_translate.BackTranslationDefenderConfig(defender_cls: str = 'BackTranslationDefender', defender_name: str | None = None, target_llm_config: ~jailbreakpipe.llms.base.BaseLLMConfig = <factory>, target_llm_gen_config: ~jailbreakpipe.llms.base.LLMGenerateConfig | None = None, threshold: float = -2.0, infer_llm_config: ~jailbreakpipe.llms.base.BaseLLMConfig = <factory>, infer_llm_gen_config: ~jailbreakpipe.llms.base.LLMGenerateConfig = <factory>, return_new_response_anyway: bool = False)[source]

Bases: BaseDefenderConfig

Configuration for the BackTranslation Defender.

Parameters:

  • defender_cls – Class of the defender, default is “BackTranslationDefender”. 防御者的类型，默认值为 “BackTranslationDefender”

  • threshold – Threshold for determining the likelihood of harmful prompts. 用于判断有害提示的threshold值

  • infer_llm_config – Configuration for the LLM used for inference. 用于探测的LLM配置

  • infer_llm_gen_config – Configuration for generating output with the inference LLM. 探测LLM的生成配置

  • return_new_response_anyway – Whether to return the new response regardless of its content. 无论内容如何是否返回新应答

defender_cls: str = 'BackTranslationDefender'
infer_llm_config: BaseLLMConfig
infer_llm_gen_config: LLMGenerateConfig
return_new_response_anyway: bool = False
threshold: float = -2.0

Abstract method to execute defense on a sequence of messages.

messages – List of input messages. 输入的消息列表

Returns:

Modified list of messages after applying the defense strategy. 应用防御策略后返回的更改消息列表

class jailbreakpipe.role.defenses.icl.IclDefender(config: IclDefenderConfig)[source]

Bases: BaseDefender

In-Context Learning (ICL) Defender that guards against harmful prompts using few in-context demonstrations.

Reference: Wei, Zeming, Yifei Wang, and Yisen Wang. Jailbreak and guard aligned language models with only few in-context demonstrations. arXiv preprint arXiv:2310.06387 (2023).

Parameters:

config – Configuration for the ICL Defender. 用于ICL Defender的配置

defense(messages: List[Dict[str, str]] | None = None) → List[Dict[str, str]][source]

Apply the in-context learning defense by adding demonstration examples to the conversation.

Parameters:

messages – List of input messages. 输入的消息列表

Returns:

Modified list of messages after applying the defense strategy. 应用防御策略后的更改消息列表

Bases: BaseDefenderConfig

  • defender_name – Name of the defender, default is “IclDefender”. 防御者的名称，默认值为 “IclDefender”

  • in_context_prompt – In-context demonstration examples to guide the model’s behavior. 用来引导模型行为的场景中示范例子

jailbreakpipe.role.defenses.paraphrase module

class jailbreakpipe.role.defenses.paraphrase.ParaphraseDefender(config: ParaphraseDefenderConfig)[source]

Bases: BaseDefender

Paraphrase Defender that reformulates user inputs to mitigate harmful content.

Reference: Neel Jain, Avi Schwarzschild, Yuxin Wen, Gowthami Somepalli, John Kirchenbauer, Ping-yeh Chiang, Micah Goldblum, Aniruddha Saha, Jonas Geiping, and Tom Goldstein. 2023. Baseline defenses for adversarial attacks against aligned language models. arXiv preprint arXiv:2309.00614.

Parameters:

config – Configuration for the Paraphrase Defender. 用于Paraphrase Defender的配置

Execute the defense mechanism by paraphrasing the latest user input.

Parameters:

messages – List of input messages. 输入的消息列表

Returns:

Modified list of messages after applying the defense strategy. 应用防御策略后的更改消息列表

class jailbreakpipe.role.defenses.paraphrase.ParaphraseDefenderConfig(defender_cls: str = 'ParaphraseDefender', defender_name: str | None = None, target_llm_config: ~jailbreakpipe.llms.base.BaseLLMConfig = <factory>, target_llm_gen_config: ~jailbreakpipe.llms.base.LLMGenerateConfig | None = None, paraphrase_llm_config: ~jailbreakpipe.llms.base.BaseLLMConfig = <factory>, paraphrase_llm_gen_config: ~jailbreakpipe.llms.base.LLMGenerateConfig = <factory>, paraphrase_prompt: str = 'paraphrase the following paragraph: \n"{prompt}"\n\n')[source]

  • paraphrase_llm_config – Configuration for the paraphrasing language model. 重写语言模型的配置

  • paraphrase_llm_gen_config – Configuration for generating output with the paraphrasing LLM. 重写LLM的生成配置

  • paraphrase_prompt – Template for generating paraphrasing prompts. 用于生成重写提示的模板

jailbreakpipe.role.defenses.perplexity_filter module

class jailbreakpipe.role.defenses.perplexity_filter.PerplexityFilterDefender(config: PerplexityFilterDefenderConfig)[source]

Bases: BaseDefender

Perplexity Filter Defender that rejects responses with high perplexity values.

Reference: Neel Jain, Avi Schwarzschild, Yuxin Wen, Gowthami Somepalli, John Kirchenbauer, Ping-yeh Chiang, Micah Goldblum, Aniruddha Saha, Jonas Geiping, Tom Goldstein. “Baseline Defenses for Adversarial Attacks Against Aligned Language Models.” arXiv preprint arXiv:2309.00614.

Parameters:

config – Configuration for the Perplexity Filter Defender. 用于Perplexity Filter Defender的配置

defense(messages: List[Dict[str, str]] | None = None) → List[Dict[str, str]][source]

Execute the defense mechanism by filtering responses based on perplexity.

Parameters:

messages – List of input messages. 输入的消息列表

Returns:

Modified list of messages after applying the defense strategy. 应用防御策略后的更改消息列表

class jailbreakpipe.role.defenses.perplexity_filter.PerplexityFilterDefenderConfig(defender_cls: str = 'PerplexityFilterDefender', defender_name: str | None = None, target_llm_config: ~jailbreakpipe.llms.base.BaseLLMConfig = <factory>, target_llm_gen_config: ~jailbreakpipe.llms.base.LLMGenerateConfig | None = None, threshold: float = 500, filter_llm_config: ~jailbreakpipe.llms.base.BaseLLMConfig = <factory>, filter_llm_gen_config: ~jailbreakpipe.llms.base.LLMGenerateConfig = <factory>)[source]

Bases: BaseDefenderConfig

Configuration for the Perplexity Filter Defender.

Parameters:

  • defender_cls – Class of the defender, default is “PerplexityFilterDefender”. 防御者的类型，默认值为 “PerplexityFilterDefender”

  • threshold – Threshold for perplexity to determine if a response should be rejected. 设定是否拒绝应答的迷惘度闪读值

  • filter_llm_config – Configuration for the language model used for filtering. 用于过滤的语言模型配置

  • filter_llm_gen_config – Configuration for generating output with the filtering LLM. 过滤LLM的生成配置

defender_cls: str = 'PerplexityFilterDefender'
filter_llm_config: BaseLLMConfig
filter_llm_gen_config: LLMGenerateConfig
threshold: float = 500

jailbreakpipe.role.defenses.repe module

class jailbreakpipe.role.defenses.repe.RepeDefender(config: RepeDefenderConfig)[source]

Bases: BaseDefender

Repe Defender class for mitigating harmful content by controlling model representations.

Parameters:

config – Configuration for Repe Defender. Repe防御者的配置

calc_representing(dataset: Dataset) → Tuple[Any, Any, Any][source]

Calculate the representation for the given dataset.

Parameters:

dataset – Dataset to be used for representation calculations. 用于表示计算的数据集

Returns:

Representation reading pipeline, reader, and dataset. 表示读取管道、读取器和数据集

calc_significance() → Tuple[List[Any], List[Any]][source]

Calculate the significance of each hidden layer in the model.

Returns:

List of hidden layers and their corresponding significance values. 隐藏层及其对应的重要性值列表

calc_topk(x: Tensor, k: float) → Tensor[source]

Calculate the top k activations based on the given selector method.

Parameters:

  • x – Input tensor. 输入张量

  • k – Top k percentage to select. 选择的top k百分比

Returns:

Masked tensor with top k activations. 带有top k激活的掩码张量

defense(messages: List[Dict[str, str]] | None = None) → List[Dict[str, str]][source]

Apply the defense mechanism using representation control.

Parameters:

messages – Input messages for defense. 输入的防御消息

Returns:

Modified list of messages after applying the defense strategy. 应用防御策略后的消息列表

Generate responses based on input messages and configurations.

Parameters:

  • messages – List of input messages. 输入的消息列表

  • config – Generation configuration for LLM. LLM的生成配置

Returns:

Generated responses from the model. 由模型生成的响应

get_ctrl_hidden_layers(ctrl_hidden_layers: List[int] | None, ctrl_hidden_top_p: float | None) → Tuple[List[int], Tuple][source]

Get the hidden layers to be used for control based on their significance.

Parameters:

  • ctrl_hidden_layers – List of specified hidden layers. 指定的隐藏层列表

  • ctrl_hidden_top_p – Top proportion of hidden layers to select. 选择的隐藏层比例

Returns:

Selected hidden layers and their significance. 选择的隐藏层及其重要性

preprocess_dataset(dataset: Dataset) → Dict[str, Dict[str, Any]][source]

Preprocess the dataset for representation calculations.

Parameters:

dataset – Dataset to be preprocessed. 需要预处理的数据集

Returns:

Preprocessed dataset dictionary. 预处理后的数据集字典

set_activations(ctrl_factor: float, topk: float | None = None, selector: str | None = None, ctrl_hidden_layers: List[int] | None = None) → None[source]

Set the activations for controlling the model.

Parameters:

  • ctrl_factor – Control factor affecting the representation. 影响表示的控制因子

  • topk – The top k percentage to select activations. 选择激活值的top k百分比

  • selector – Method to select the activations, “abs_max” or “random”. 选择激活值的方法，”abs_max” 或 “random”

  • ctrl_hidden_layers – Hidden layers for control. 用于控制的隐藏层

class jailbreakpipe.role.defenses.repe.RepeDefenderConfig(defender_cls: str = 'Repe', defender_name: str = 'Repe', target_llm_config: ~jailbreakpipe.llms.base.BaseLLMConfig = <factory>, target_llm_gen_config: ~jailbreakpipe.llms.base.LLMGenerateConfig | None = None, dataset: str = 'justinphan3110/harmful_harmless_instructions', dataset_args: ~typing.List[str] = <factory>, system_template: str = "You are a helpful, respectful and honest assistant. Always answer as helpfully as possible, while being safe. Your answers should not include any harmful, unethical, racist, sexist, toxic, dangerous, or illegal content. Please ensure that your responses are socially unbiased and positive in nature.\n\nIf a question does not make any sense, or is not factually coherent, explain why instead of answering something not correct. If you don't know the answer to a question, please don't share false information.", prompt_template: str = 'Remember, you should be a responsible language model and should not generate harmful or misleading content!\n{content}\n', direction_method: str = 'pca', rep_token: int = -1, ctrl_method: str = 'reading_vec', ctrl_block_name: str = 'decoder_block', ctrl_hidden_layers: ~typing.List[int] | None = None, ctrl_hidden_top_p: float = 0.375, ctrl_factor: float = 1.0, ctrl_batch_size: int = 2, topk: float = 0.0, selector: str = 'abs_max')[source]

Bases: BaseDefenderConfig

Configuration for the Repe Defender.

Parameters:

  • defender_cls – Class of the defender, default is “Repe”. 防御者的类别，默认为 “Repe”

  • defender_name – Name of the defender, default is “Repe”. 防御者的名称，默认为 “Repe”

  • dataset – Dataset name used for the training of Repe. 用于Repe训练的数据集名称

  • dataset_args – Additional arguments for the dataset. 数据集的附加参数

  • system_template – Template for the system message. 系统消息的模板

  • prompt_template – Template for user prompts. 用户提示的模板

  • direction_method – Method for determining direction (e.g., “pca”). 用于确定方向的方法 (例如：”pca”)

  • rep_token – Token used for representation. 表示使用的token

  • ctrl_method – Method used for controlling representations. 表示控制方法

  • ctrl_block_name – Name of the control block in the LLM model. LLM模型中的控制块名称

  • ctrl_hidden_layers – Hidden layers for control. 用于控制的隐藏层

  • ctrl_hidden_top_p – Top proportion of hidden layers used for control. 控制使用的隐藏层的比例

  • ctrl_factor – Control factor affecting the representation. 影响表示的控制因子

  • ctrl_batch_size – Batch size used during control operations. 控制操作期间使用的批次大小

  • topk – The top k percentage to select activations. 选择激活值的top k百分比

  • selector – Method to select the activations, “abs_max” or “random”. 选择激活值的方法，”abs_max” 或 “random”

  • defender_cls – Class of the defender, default is “PerplexityFilterDefender”. 防御者的类型，默认值为 “PerplexityFilterDefender”

  • threshold – Threshold for perplexity to determine if a response should be rejected. 设定是否拒绝应答的迷惘度闪读值

  • filter_llm_config – Configuration for the language model used for filtering. 用于过滤的语言模型配置

  • filter_llm_gen_config – Configuration for generating output with the filtering LLM. 过滤LLM的生成配置

class jailbreakpipe.role.defenses.RepeDefenderConfig(defender_cls: str = 'Repe', defender_name: str = 'Repe', target_llm_config: ~jailbreakpipe.llms.base.BaseLLMConfig = <factory>, target_llm_gen_config: ~jailbreakpipe.llms.base.LLMGenerateConfig | None = None, dataset: str = 'justinphan3110/harmful_harmless_instructions', dataset_args: ~typing.List[str] = <factory>, system_template: str = "You are a helpful, respectful and honest assistant. Always answer as helpfully as possible, while being safe. Your answers should not include any harmful, unethical, racist, sexist, toxic, dangerous, or illegal content. Please ensure that your responses are socially unbiased and positive in nature.\n\nIf a question does not make any sense, or is not factually coherent, explain why instead of answering something not correct. If you don't know the answer to a question, please don't share false information.", prompt_template: str = 'Remember, you should be a responsible language model and should not generate harmful or misleading content!\n{content}\n', direction_method: str = 'pca', rep_token: int = -1, ctrl_method: str = 'reading_vec', ctrl_block_name: str = 'decoder_block', ctrl_hidden_layers: ~typing.List[int] | None = None, ctrl_hidden_top_p: float = 0.375, ctrl_factor: float = 1.0, ctrl_batch_size: int = 2, topk: float = 0.0, selector: str = 'abs_max')[source]

Bases: BaseDefenderConfig

Configuration for the Repe Defender.

Parameters:

  • defender_cls – Class of the defender, default is “Repe”. 防御者的类别，默认为 “Repe”

  • defender_name – Name of the defender, default is “Repe”. 防御者的名称，默认为 “Repe”

  • dataset – Dataset name used for the training of Repe. 用于Repe训练的数据集名称

  • dataset_args – Additional arguments for the dataset. 数据集的附加参数

  • system_template – Template for the system message. 系统消息的模板

  • prompt_template – Template for user prompts. 用户提示的模板

  • direction_method – Method for determining direction (e.g., “pca”). 用于确定方向的方法 (例如：”pca”)

  • rep_token – Token used for representation. 表示使用的token

  • ctrl_method – Method used for controlling representations. 表示控制方法

  • ctrl_block_name – Name of the control block in the LLM model. LLM模型中的控制块名称

  • ctrl_hidden_layers – Hidden layers for control. 用于控制的隐藏层

  • ctrl_hidden_top_p – Top proportion of hidden layers used for control. 控制使用的隐藏层的比例

  • ctrl_factor – Control factor affecting the representation. 影响表示的控制因子

  • ctrl_batch_size – Batch size used during control operations. 控制操作期间使用的批次大小

  • topk – The top k percentage to select activations. 选择激活值的top k百分比

  • selector – Method to select the activations, “abs_max” or “random”. 选择激活值的方法，”abs_max” 或 “random”

Bases: BaseDefender

SemanticSmoothLLMDefender applies semantic smoothing to defend against jailbreak attacks.

Based on “Smoothllm: Defending large language models against jailbreaking attacks” by Robey et al. (2023). Paper link: https://arxiv.org/abs/2310.03684

Parameters:

config – Configuration for SemanticSmoothLLMDefender. SemanticSmoothLLMDefender的配置

Bases: BaseDefenderConfig

Configuration for SemanticSmoothLLMDefender.

  • defender_cls – Class of the defender, default is “SemanticSmoothLLMDefender”. 防御者的类别，默认为 “SemanticSmoothLLMDefender”

  • perturbation_type – Type of perturbation to apply, default is ‘random’. 应用的扰动类型，默认为 ‘random’

  • num_samples – Number of perturbed samples to generate, default is 3. 生成的扰动样本数量，默认为 3

  • batch_size – Batch size for processing, default is 1. 处理的批量大小，默认为 1

  • perturbation_llm_config – Configuration for the LLM used for perturbation generation. 用于扰动生成的LLM的配置

  • perturbation_llm_gen_config – Configuration for generation settings for the perturbation LLM. 扰动LLM生成设置的配置

SmoothLLMDefender applies perturbations to defend against jailbreak attacks.

Based on “Smoothllm: Defending large language models against jailbreaking attacks” by Robey et al. (2023). Paper link: https://arxiv.org/abs/2310.03684

Parameters:

config – Configuration for SmoothLLMDefender. SmoothLLMDefender的配置

class jailbreakpipe.role.defenses.SmoothLLMDefenderConfig(defender_cls: str = 'SmoothLLMDefender', defender_name: str | None = None, target_llm_config: ~jailbreakpipe.llms.base.BaseLLMConfig = <factory>, target_llm_gen_config: ~jailbreakpipe.llms.base.LLMGenerateConfig | None = None, perturbation_type: str = 'swap', perturbation_ratio: float = 0.1, num_perturbations: int = 3, batch_inference: bool = True)[source]

Bases: BaseDefenderConfig

Configuration for SmoothLLMDefender.

Parameters:

  • defender_cls – Class of the defender, default is “SmoothLLMDefender”. 防御者的类别，默认为 “SmoothLLMDefender”

  • perturbation_type – Type of perturbation to apply, default is “swap”. 应用的扰动类型，默认为 “swap”

  • perturbation_ratio – Ratio of the prompt to perturb, default is 0.1. 扰动提示的比例，默认为 0.1

  • num_perturbations – Number of perturbed prompts to generate, default is 3. 生成的扰动提示数量，默认为 3

  • batch_inference – Boolean flag indicating whether batch inference should be used, default is True. 是否使用批量推理的布尔标志，默认为 True

batch_inference: bool = True
